detaileddescription.para: The async event component vt::event::AsyncEvent, accessed via vt::theEvent() manages local and remote events that complete asynchronously. One may create an event for a MPI_Request so the scheduler tests the event as the scheduler polls. Once may also create other general events that have a unique ID that can be tested remotely. Parent events group sets of other events (parent, normal, or MPI events) together to test them for completion in a single operation. The event manager is mostly designed for internal vt usage.
